'''Beta 1.6.2''' is a version of [[Java Edition Beta]] released on May 26, 2011, to fix an item duplication bug that existed in [[Beta 1.6]] and [[Beta 1.6.1]].<ref>{{tweet|notch|73683016853102592|Minecraft Beta 1.6.2 should fix the item dupe bug.|May 26, 2011}}</ref><ref>{{twon|5864594578|Minecraft Beta 1.6.3|May 16, 2011}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed an item duplication bug when picking up any equipment that is damaged. In Beta 1.6 and Beta 1.6.1, damaged equipment would make an item with a stack count of 0 when dropped, which the player could pick up infinitely.
